website_summaries.verdict: The LEGO Harry Potter Collection pulls the best moments from the beloved series and presents them in a family-friendly and easy to play adventure for everyone.
pros: Includes LEGO Harry Potter Years 1-4 and 5-7 games
Available on Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PS4
cons: A set of unchallenging LEGO games

customer_reviews.title: It is actually a very fun game, some dumb humor but we enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: My husband has tried to get me to play video games with him for years to no avail. I told him I'd play a Harry Potter game, but was skeptical when he bought the Lego collection. It is actually a very fun game, some dumb humor but we enjoy it. Would be great for kids too!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Schoenbaechler

customer_reviews.title: A must for Harry Potter fans!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a Harry Potter fan you have to get this, the original Harry Potter games were quite bad except the Chamber of Secrets which was pretty good but this Lego collection is good in general, I mean come on you get all of the Harry Potter years in one collection. Just reminding people that there is no dialogue in this game, but if you are a Harry Potter fan you will definitely know what's going on. If you know the story then you will not have trouble at all figuring out what's going on it's quite fun to just run around in the Harry Potter World. I highly recommend this game to any Harry Potter fan.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!!
customer_reviews.text: Harry Potter Lego Collection for the PS4 is the same as it ws for the PS3. It’s just a good, fun game. You can play all the characters and do fun missions that follow the movies. You can fly on a broom and make potions and cast fun spells. If you get tired of aome of the shoot ‘em up games-this game is sweet and is a nice change of pace. Harry Potter fans should really love this-and if you also love Legos it’s super great!

product_meta.title: LEGO Harry Potter Collection - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description: Platform:PlayStation 4The LEGO Harry Potter Collection brings LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1 4 and LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5 7 to the PlayStation4 computer entertainment system for the first time with both top selling videogames remastered on one disc! This compilation unites the creative prowess of LEGO and the expansive world of Harry Potter, with an exciting journey full of spell casting, potion making, puzzle solving, lessons, dueling and much more for players of all ages to enjoy. Gamers can experience the entire LEGO Harry Potter adventure featuring content from seven books and eight films, with enhanced graphics, environments, lighting and visual effects, along with two downloadable content (DLC) packs. Sure to delight fans of J.K. Rowling's ever expanding Wizarding World, the LEGO Harry Potter Collection serves as a perfect gift for those eagerly anticipating the upcoming film, Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them, a prequel to the Harry Potter film series.
feature_bullets: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1 4 and LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5 7 on PlayStation 4 for the first time, both top selling video games remastered on 1 disc
Discover and unlock all of your favorite characters from the across the wizarding world of Harry Potter, while taking an interactive journey through iconic locations from the beloved books and films
